statements: DELETE FROM spare_parts_and_equipment WHERE part_category = 'Electronics' AND unit_price > 500.00;
DELETE FROM spare_parts_and_equipment WHERE part_id = 101 AND quantity > 10;
DELETE FROM spare_parts_and_equipment WHERE part_category = 'Electronics' AND unit_price < 100.00;
DELETE FROM equipment WHERE equipment_name = 'Printer' AND status = 'Active';
DELETE FROM equipment WHERE quantity < 10 AND location = 'Warehouse';
DELETE FROM maintenance_records WHERE technician_name = 'John Smith';
